adrFormatAddress: 157 E 55th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Darbar catered our wedding and did a superlative job! We had been searching for the ideal caterer and when we met the owner Mike and tried the food we made one of the easiest decisions of our wedding.

They delivered. The food was stellar, but it was the service that truly left a mark. Mike and his team were so professional and managed all of the food and drink of our wedding without any need for further direction from our team, even taking care of things as needed to ensure we were able to focus on the event itself.

Could not more highly recommend Darbar for your event, they are  the best!

originalText.text:
An amazing restaurant with wonderful food, including catering service. Mike and Bobby are incredible at coordinating - they're both very professional and ensure that the food and service is always top quality. Definitely going to order food from them again.

I would highly recommend the following dishes:
Goat biriyani, eggplant bhartha and beetroot malai kofta to name a few of their amazing  selections.

originalText.text:
HIGHLY recommend!!! We worked with Manek at Darbar to cater our Mehendi celebration and we had the best experience. They handled everything - they ordered and managed the rentals, they stayed in constant communication with the venue, and they set up the whole space beautifully.  Our venue had some issues that posed some difficulties for Darbar, but they tackled every obstacle with such professionalism. And they were extremely accommodating with me about arranging a payment schedule, etc. Manek always answered my calls and was very easy to work with.

And as for the food… it was a huge hit!!! We had three entrees - the Chef’s Special Chicken, Saag Paneer and Vegetable Biryani (along with sides of rice and naan of course). Everybody loved the food, and I will say that the Chef’s Special Chicken was the favorite dish of the night among our guests. The appetizers were also excellent (reshmi kebab, samosas and gobi manchurian) and so was dessert (kheer and gulab jamun). All our guests left very happy and well fed.

Between the quality of the food and the quality of the service, my wife and I give Darbar a 10 out of 10!

originalText.text: My husband and I used Darbar catering for a welcome party for 130 of our out-of-town guests on the night before our wedding. Darbar was wonderful to work with. Leading up to the event we worked with Mike and Priti to plan the menu and logistics of the evening and they were always very professional and responsive. On the night of the event, the food was absolutely delicious, it looked amazing (presentation was impeccable), and service was excellent. We received  lots of good feedback about the food from many of our guests, including guests who are Indian and guests who are not. Mike did a great job helping us to select a menu with items that appealed to everyone and had the right amount of spiciness to satisfy everyone. I would definitely recommend Darbar to anyone looking for delicious, highly professional Indian catering.

originalText.text: Darbar catered our 100 person wedding in Greenpoint and everything went perfect!  Manek and his team were all really on top of everything the whole way through.  So many people came up during the party to let me know how much they enjoyed the food.  They were prompt and professional, always quick to respond to any questions leading up to the big day.  Much thanks to the manager for even helping me tie my tie!!!
